references.paper_title: Photorealistic text-to-image diffusion models with deep language understanding
references.reason: This paper is foundational for text-to-image diffusion models, and its techniques are highly relevant to the current work.

references.paper_title: Improving image generation with better captions
references.reason: This paper introduces DALL-E 3, a highly influential model that significantly advanced the state-of-the-art in text-to-image generation.

references.paper_title: Scaling rectified flow transformers for high-resolution image synthesis
references.reason: This paper introduces Stable Diffusion 3, a major advancement in high-resolution image generation, and its impact is crucial for the current research.
This paper introduces the Diffusion Transformer model, which is a key component of the methods used in the current study.

references.paper_title: Pixart-a: Fast training of diffusion transformer for photorealistic text-to-image synthesis
references.reason: This paper proposes the PixArt-a model, whose architecture and training strategies are closely related to the methods described in the current paper.
